*|Doctor Evidence-Sanofi Post-training email|*
Dear {!Contact.Name}, Thank you for attending our overview training on Doctor Evidence's platforms and services, including our advanced search tool, DOC Search. Attached please find the slides used during the session, as well as quickguides on how to use the DOC Search platform.
You have access to DOC Search, as well as DOC Library and DOC Data, through a Single-sign on (SSO) system. Please use your existing Sanofi credentials to login to the Doctor Evidence Platform, including DOC Search, by navigating to: https://sanofi.doctorevidence.com/
To view videos on navigating DOC Search, as well as videos on other Doctor Evidence platforms, please visit https://dre.litmos.com/self-signup/. Enter the code “Sanofi” when you create your account..
To initiate a project with DRE, please complete this brief form: https://reports.doctorevidence.com/pages/Client/ServiceProject.aspx.
Please let us know by replying to this email if you are interested in training on using DRE's analytical platform, DOC Data, to review a body of evidence, to export data for deliverables and to conduct analyses.
Thank You,
Nancy Morgan Director of Learning and Development Doctor Evidence 301 Arizona Ave Suite 301 Santa Monica CA 90401 847-507-1451
